casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Charles James CONWAY. No. 548P08. Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 17, 2008. James R. Glover, Ann B. Petersen, Chapel Hill, for Conway. G. Dewey Hudson, District Attorney, for State.

Prior report: ___ N.C.App. ___, 669 S.E.2d 40.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 16th day of December 2008 by State of NC for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 17th day of December 2008."
